title: I only have x8 Scaling CDR Blues?
body: In my collection I have only x8 Scaling CDR Blues tier 3, I can't find a 9th one in my inventory or in the store. I am using the new client, could that be an issue?

replies.body:
Can you swap over to the Legacy Client (from login) to see if they pop up in the other client?

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if this caused a change!

So I exited and saved it, then I loaded up legacy again and it was still there so I took one scale cdr rune off and went back to the new client and I had one in my inventory, seems to have been fixed, thankyou.
The legacy seemed to make it work
